attributes.action: ask apple to be fair to UK consumers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apple today launched their new macbooks.  We in the UK are once again being ripped off in terms of price.  Mr Jobs said they would cost $999 USD.  In the UK on Apple's webste they are listed as £949 GBP.  Why do they always do this to UK consumers???

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
